html5.title: HTML5
html5.description: It allows the structuring of content and is essential for defining the semantics and structure of websites.

css3.title: CSS3
css3.description: Used to design and customize the visual appearance of web pages, enabling control over layout, colors, fonts, and more.

javascript.title: JavaScript
javascript.description: It's an interpreted programming language primarily used on the client-side for creating dynamic web pages, enabling interactivity with the user, data manipulation, and more.

typescript.title: TypeScript
typescript.description: It's a superset of JavaScript, adding static types and class-based objects. It aids in developing large applications and compiles to JavaScript to be executed in the browser.
